doc:
Candy Candido https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Candy_Candido 0 Candy Candido (December 25, 1913 – May 19, 1999) was an American radio performer, bass player, vocalist and animation voice actor, best remembered for his famous line, "I'm feeling mighty low." Candy_Candido ( December_25_,_1913 – May_19_,_1999 ) was an_American_radio_performer , bass_player , vocalist_and_animation_voice_actor , best remembered for his_famous_line , " I 'm_feeling mighty_low .
